ESRS E1 paragraph 13 requires the ‘percentage of remuneration recognised’ to be disclosed. The
phrase used requires that the denominator be the remuneration recognised, i.e. the total of fixed
and variable remuneration recognised, and that the numerator be the ‘remuneration
recognised … that is linked to climate-related considerations’.
